alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:52PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Elko and northern Eureka Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 351 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Carlin, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Elko and northern Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
